data.name: SearchTextToolTip
data.value: Search criteria for text (matches file path/description)

data.value: Search for files within selected directory

data.name: SearchAllFilesWithinCurrentFileDirectoryToolTip
data.value: Search all files within current file directory (recursive)

data.value: Search for newly added files meta-data

data.name: SearchBySelectedPersonAndOthersToolTip

data.name: SearchBySelectedPersonsAndOthersToolTip

data.name: SearchForFileWithPersonsOfTheSpecifiedAgeToolTip
data.value: Search for file with persons of the specified age

data.name: SearchAllFilesExceptWhatWasSpecifiedToolTip
data.value: Search all files except what was specified

data.name: SearchAllFilesFromSearch1ThatAlsoBelongToSearch2ToolTip
data.value: All files from search 1 that also belong to search 2

data.name: SearchAllFilesThatAreInEitherOfTheSearchesButNotInTheirIntersectionToolTip
data.value: All files that are in either of the searches, but not in their intersection

data.name: AboutGettingStarted1
data.value: Play around with the included demo files collection.

data.name: AboutGettingStarted2
data.value: Cleanup your files collection (see guideline below)

data.name: AboutGettingStarted3
data.value: Create a database for your files collection and adjust your settings

data.name: AboutGettingStarted5
data.value: Find your wanted pictures and run slideshows!

data.name: AboutNotes1
data.value: FileDB only modifies data in the configured database. It does not modify any files in your files collection. Files are read when importing meta-data and when viewing files.

data.name: AboutNotes2
data.value: Although any directory structure can be imported to FileDB, take a moment to think about the directory structure before importing the meta-data. This layout has been proven to work very well:

data.name: AboutNotes3
data.value: If you rename or delete files that has been imported to FileDB you need to remove the FileDB meta-data as well (and possibly add them again). A tool will be provided in the future that helps out with this procedure.

data.name: AboutCommandLineArgDemoText
data.value: Enable demo configuration to play around with

data.name: AddPersonSetCurrentFileToolTip
data.value: Set profile picture from the selected file in current search result

data.name: BrowseDirectoriesSelectToolTip
data.value: Search for files within selected directory

data.name: SettingsResetChangesButtonToolTip
data.value: Reset changes to last saved configuration

data.name: SettingsOverlayTextSizeForLargeModeLabel
data.value: Overlay text size for large mode:

data.name: SettingsFilesRootDirectoryMissingLabel
data.value: Files root directory missing (i.e. network share not mounted)

data.name: SettingsNumberOfSearchResultImagesToPreloadLabel
data.value: Number of search result images to preload:

data.name: SettingsNumberOfLoadedImagesToKeepInMemoryLabel
data.value: Number of loaded images to keep in memory:

data.name: SettingsLocationLinkToolTip
data.value: LAT and LON is replaced with actual GPS position data when generating links. Set empty to disable feature.

data.name: ToolsDatabaseBackupWarning1
data.value: Database recovery must be done manually if needed. Backup of your files collection, settings and database to external media should be done continuously!

data.name: ToolsDatabaseExportInfo
data.value: This tool can be used to export the complete database to JSON format to be used by 3rd party applications.

data.name: ToolsFilesCollectionFilteringInfo
data.value: This tool can be used to find imported files that should, after an updated configuration or upgraded software, no longer be included.

data.name: ToolsDatabaseDataValidationInfo
data.value: Database data validation can be performed after an application upgrade or when data has been imported manually via SQL statements.

data.name: ToolsFindMetaDataForMissingFilesInfo
data.value: This tool can be used to find outdated meta-data. This may happen if you have removed, moved or renamed files in your files collection.

data.name: ToolsFindMetaDataForMissingFilesWarning
data.value: This operation can be slow for a large collection of files or if the media access is slow (for example when using a network share).

data.name: ToolsFindMetaDataForMissingFilesCopyButton
data.value: Copy file list with missing files

data.name: ToolsDatabaseDataValidationCopyButton
data.value: Copy file list with invalid meta-data

data.name: ToolsFilesCollectionFilteringCopyButton
data.value: Copy file list with no longer applicable files

data.name: FilesCopyFileListForAddedFilesButton
data.value: Copy file list for added files

data.name: FilesInfoText
data.value: Check your settings to adjust what files will be listed.

data.name: FilesWarningText
data.value: This operation can be slow for a large collection of files or if the media access is slow (for example when using a network share).

data.name: FilesIncludeMetaDataToolTip
data.value: Enables parsing of time and GPS position from file Exif data and timestamp via path

data.name: BackupNotifierNoDatabaseBackupHasBeenCreated
data.value: Backup reminder: No database backup has been created!

data.name: BackupNotifierLongTimeSinceBackup
data.value: Backup reminder: Last database backup created {0} days ago!

data.name: StartupNotificationDemoConfigurationEnabled
data.value: Demo configuration enabled. When you are ready, make a configuration for your files collection!

data.name: StartupNotificationNoConfigurationFile
data.value: No local {0} configuration file exists. Loading demo configuration.

data.name: CategorizationCreateANewPersonAndAddItToCurrentFileToolTip
data.value: Create a new person and add it to current file

data.name: CategorizationCreateANewLocationAndAddItToCurrentFileToolTip
data.value: Create a new location and add it to current file

data.name: CategorizationCreateANewTagAndAddItToCurrentFileToolTip

data.name: CategorizationDateAndTimeFormatToolTip
data.value: Date and time formats: YYYY YYYY-MM YYYY-MM-DD YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS

data.value: Add meta-data from last edited file

data.name: CategorizationApplyMetaDataFromLastEditToolTip
data.value: Apply meta-data (persons, locations, tags and description) from last edit

data.name: CategorizationReloadFileDateTimeGPSPositionAndOrientationToolTip
data.value: Reload file date, time, GPS position and orientation from file Exif data or file path

data.name: CategorizationMarkButtonToolTip
data.value: Mark this file to be used as last edited file

data.value: No meta-data for missing files found.

data.value: Exported {0} persons, {1} locations, {2} tags and {3} files.
